column1: Kata Robata////Mains: I got the Miso Marinated Black Cod.  Again (my bad luck?)... while this was good I would call it largely forgettable. But my husband's Texas Hamachi roll ~~  wow!!!!  Love that they made it so tart with the yuzu juice
column2: and spicy with the raw jalapeno.  V original roll I thought.  Gf got a crab roll which was forgotten by the bevy of servers we had (cute waitress took our order and checked on us
column3: but we had many others come by with the plates). This was fine actually since we were all stuffed.
